channel.title: Vpn?
channel.description:
I've been trying to set up a virtual private network at my house for a few days now, can't seem to figure it out...I was wondering if anyone on here knows of some magical app other then hamachi that can do it. And is there away to use no-ip.org to do it? I have access to my modem and router, so unblocking ports isn't a problem, just don't know what ones to unlock. Any help would be much appreciated.
~Nathanator22.

item.title: Vpn?
item.dc:creator: @nathanator22 nathanator22
item.description:
@nathanator22 wrote:

[quote=“runescape3dude, post:6, topic:214302”]according to microsoft, you need the windows xp cds handy for the next steps:
Open control panel
Click add or remove programs
Click Add/remove windows components
Select Other network file and print services
It will ask you for your cd.
Thats all i remember from the website…[/quote]
Alright thanks, trying that right now…

Read full topic

item.title: Vpn?
item.dc:creator: @runescape3dude runescape3dude
item.description:
@runescape3dude wrote:

according to microsoft, you need the windows xp cds handy for the next steps:
Open control panel
Click add or remove programs
Click Add/remove windows components
Select Other network file and print services
It will ask you for your cd.
Thats all i remember from the website…

Read full topic

item.title: Vpn?
item.dc:creator: @nathanator22 nathanator22
item.description:
@nathanator22 wrote:

On another topic

Doesn’t Windows XP support it by default?

Thats what i thought too, and it even has a way to set up a network for incoming connections, but it will not let them connect. Even with no firewall set, and all the ports (that i thought) needed to be open, open.

Read full topic

item.title: Vpn?
item.dc:creator: @nathanator22 nathanator22
item.description:
@nathanator22 wrote:

I’m just trying to set up a network between me and my friends over the internet, but they can’t download hamachi. So, i’m just trying to find a way to do it with out it.

@ runescape3dude thanks i’ll try that.

Read full topic

item.title: Vpn?

item.description:

What do you want to use the VPN for?

item.title: Vpn?
item.dc:creator: @runescape3dude runescape3dude
item.description:
@runescape3dude wrote:

get windows server 2k3 and set that up… then make a dns network within your home network. Also make a network network.

And by VPN, i thought you meant Virtual Private Nigger.

Read full topic
